Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

Purple Sands

    1. in a land of purple sands - a glasswork city grew
    2. cathedrals of stained glass - and a like-wise people too
    1. from the land the Glassmen sprung - as flowers from the earth
    2. linked as one - one people all from birth
    1. such was this race of men - that none could hate or condemn
    2. and no one could suffer ill - for death would the killer kill
    1. and of this strangest race - they had no need for face or tongue
    2. for each and all saw alike - as through glass - the one
    1. to the city she brought - strange coins, strange eyes
    2. strange clothing, tantalizing hips and thighs
    1. a stranger wandered in - she had a voice you could not know
    2. a heart they could not recall - and so much blood

– Molossus Spondee

Oct 27, 2022 • poem • 2019 • 2022

Mammon If she breathes she's a thot OR I was a teenage incel force femmed by a vampire
